meanings.definition: Relating to the Christian doctrine of the Trinity.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed beautiful trinitarian symbols in its stained glass windows.
meanings.sent2: The trinitarian belief in three aspects of God is central to Christianity.
meanings.sent3: The trinitarian concept can be a bit puzzling to those unfamiliar with Christian teachings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a trinitarian blend of faith, hope, and love.
meanings.sent5: The trinitarian nature of God is a fundamental aspect of Christian theology.

meanings.definition: A person who believes in the doctrine of the Trinity.
meanings.sent1: As a trinitarian, he found comfort in the unity of Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.
meanings.sent2: The trinitarian prayed to God in three persons, yet one divine essence.
meanings.sent3: The trinitarian chuckled at the idea of having a three-in-one coffee maker.
meanings.sent4: She was a trinitarian at heart, seeing the world through a triune lens.
meanings.sent5: The trinitarian's faith was unwavering in the face of challenges.
